ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Newbie bard leaves Kunark
ygData.msgSnippet: I was there at 12th lvl soloing harpies and drakes. An auction came: 6 mino axes for healing two fighters. Turns out that I joined a 39 Shadowknight and a 37
ygData.messageBody:
I was there at 12th lvl soloing harpies and drakes.
An auction came: "6 mino axes for healing two
fighters."

Turns out that I joined a 39 Shadowknight and a 37
warrior as they camped the mino lord. I played Hymm
and anthem constantly for the next two hours and left
with 9 minotaur axes because they were so happy with
what I did for them. I was so encumbered that even
with Selos I was only walking ... something they
thought was totally hilarius;-)


--- Elijah Meeker <emeeker@...> wrote:
> I have found level 12 heaven.
>
> I took the boat from Firiona Vie last night, and
> after he gave me mega-buffs
> I had a great conversation with a level 44 Cleric
> (who also has a level 25
> bard, little played, but he reads Concery hall and
> knew his stuff).
> He suggested that before I go to unrest I spend a
> level or two in Steamfont,
> near the Mino caves. I took his suggestion and spent
> the night fighting a
> constant stream of beatable blues, it was wonderful.
> The money is not great,
> but due to the constant blue spawn exp is really
> really good. More
> importantly (for me) you are not fighting the same
> mob over and over:
> Harpies, clockworks, lesser drakes, Mino Slavers,
> Lords and Heros...*laughs*
> yeah, I saw the Lord just as he spawned in the cave,
> that didn't last long
> :o) The Hero spawned right afterward: *poof* gone. I
> avoided the elementals,
> too many hitpoints for the trouble. I AM going to
> Unrest, but not till this
> banquet is over :o)
>
> Tsengu, Nameless
>
>
> [Non-text portions of this message have been
> removed]
>
>
